node.title: World Cup luck finally on Blackcaps' side in semi-final 'game of inches'
node.description: In a reversal of fortunes, it was the Kiwis coming away with the breaks against England at an ICC tournament.
node.content: ["Blackcaps opener Daryl Mitchell has admitted they needed generous help from 'Lady Luck' to prevail against England in the semi-final of the Twenty20 World Cup on Thursday (NZ time).", "Chasing a tricky 167 on a track where England's star-studded lineup struggled to fire, New Zealand had their own difficulties with the bat that left them needing 57 runs from the last four overs.", "Jimmy Neesham then exploded, belting an 11-ball 27 and Mitchell, who remained not out after a 47-ball 72, guided New Zealand home.", "They hit a combined seven sixes, including two occasions when Chris Jordan and Jonny Bairstow caught the ball near the rope but just could not check their momentum.", "\"Look, we were obviously very lucky at times,\" said Mitchell, who was adjudged man-of-the-match for his stellar innings.", "\"A couple sailed over the ropes that could have been a metre shorter and we're all out.", "\"But at the same time we always knew that as long as we kept sort of just within the certain numbers that we felt comfortable with that we were always in with a chance.\"", "It took a special cameo from Neesham to win the match but Mitchell said the Blackcaps were always in the contest.", "\"It probably sounds weird, but it never felt like it was out of our grasp,\" the 30-year-old said.", "\"I think especially with that smaller side boundary on one side, we knew that there were going to be matchups there that might suit us towards the end.\"", "The late drama was a reminder of the heart-stopping final of the 2019 One Day International World Cup between the teams where England were crowned the 50-overs champions due to a now-scrapped boundary countback rule, while benefitting from a series of NZ misfortunes.", "\"It's a bit of a blur, but I can imagine it was a hell of a game to watch, and I think the way England played was very special,\" Mitchell said.", "\"It's obviously pretty cool to get the job done, but I know it's a game of inches.\"", "In Monday's final, New Zealand, the reigning world test champions, will meet the winners of Friday's second semi-final between Pakistan and Australia.", "Reuters.", "Join Newshub for live updates of the T20 World Cup final from 3am Monday."]
